Another nail in the flash drive's coffin

Another nail in the flash drive's coffin — — Microsoft: If you’re subscribed to Office 365 ($6.99/mo), get ready for unlimited OneDrive storage. There’s a digital waiting list, but this could be a good deal for students who are already on their university’s subscription.

Published 26 October 2014

Enjoy your day.
